q = int(input())

for i in range(q):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int,input().split()))
    print(sum(a)//n + (sum(a)%n > 0))

q = int(input())

for _ in range(q):
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print(math.ceil(sum(arr)/n))

q = int(input())
for _ in range(q):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print(sum(a) // n + 1)

#SOLUTION

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n=int(input())
    a=list(map(int,input().split()))
    print(sum(a)//n+1 if sum(a)%n else sum(a)//n)

# SOLUTION

for i in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int,input().split()))
    print(sum(l)//n + (1 if (sum(l)%n) else 0))

n = int(input())
for i in range(n):
    a = int(input())
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print(sum(b)//a)

# SOLUTION
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print(max(a))
